channel.title: Comments for page "The Apocalypse is Now!"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: OH SHIT CAN WAIT FOR THE APOCALPSE.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
i can't wait for the apocalypse. god is always on our side. hallelujah for g-dog.
p.s. there's aliens in the government.

item.title: The apocalypse
item.content:encoded:
I understand the apocalypse is the last battle between the prince of darkness and destruction & the KING OF KINGS creator and builder of Life. we are the pawns in this game of chess. life or death. only our eternal inheritance is at stake. many people are selling their souls for this world when they should be looking forward to the new one. in these days prophecy is fulfilling.
Daniel 2:41 And whereas you saw the feet and toes, part of potters’ clay, and part of iron, the kingdom will be divided… 43 And whereas you saw iron mixed with miry clay, they will mingle themselves with the seed of men: but they will not cleave one to another, even as iron is not mixed with clay. 44 And in the days of these kings will the God of heaven set up a kingdom, which will never be destroyed: (this is saying a one world won't happen even though the rulers & princes are inter-marrying)

item.title: the apocalypse
item.content:encoded:
I understand the apocalypse is the last battle between the prince of darkness and destruction & the KING OF KINGS creator and builder of Life. we are the pawns in this game of chess. life or death. only our eternal inheritance is at stake. many people are selling their souls for this world when they should be looking forward to the new one. in these days prophecy is fulfilling.
Daniel 2:41 And whereas you saw the feet and toes, part of potters’ clay, and part of iron, the kingdom will be divided… 43 And whereas you saw iron mixed with miry clay, they will mingle themselves with the seed of men: but they will not cleave one to another, even as iron is not mixed with clay. 44 And in the days of these kings will the God of heaven set up a kingdom, which will never be destroyed: (this is saying a one world won't happen even though the rulers & princes are inter-marrying)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: What verse are you taking this from? Revelation speaks of earthquakes, but it doesn't say that they are "before" the End Times. Meanwhile, we have had a number of strong earthquakes already, and the 3/11 Japanese quake was even "blamed" on the Beast. What makes you think it will be in Georgia?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: According to the Bible, the apocalypse has not started yet. It will start after very strong earthquake on the territory of our Georgia.
